item.title: Understanding ecological change across large spatial, temporal and taxonomic scales: integrating data and methods in light of theory
item.description: Related materials Understanding #ecological #change across large #spatial, #temporal, and #taxonomic scales: integrating #data and methods in light of theory Our synthesis paper with @jessicablois now out and #openaccess in @EcographyJourna https://t.co/wfBFR1LRqR pic.twitter.com/dO1aWb39YX — Gio Rapacciuolo (@giorapac) May 14, 2019
